nodes.text: This pirate group operated during the Galactic Civil War, and did not discriminate between targets, choosing to attack vessels allied to the Rebel Alliance and the Galactic Empire, as well as neutral starships. Among the pirates were a Duros gunner, Krudar, and a Guudrian known as Boom. Shortly prior to the liberation of the planet Kal'Shebbol in 8 ABY, Imperial forces decimated the organization. Krudar and Boom managed to escape to Kal'Shebbol.
